title: Iowa man accidentally shoots himself
content:
An Iowa man who accidentally shot himself is suffering from non-life threatening injuries, according to a news release from the Madison County Sheriff's Office.
Around 4 p.m. Thursday, the sheriff's office received a call that a man was shot in the 1500 block of North River Trail.
Responding deputies found the man who was shot. A preliminary investigation shows he may have accidentally shot himself and there is no public threat. He was transported to a Des Moines hospital by ambulance, according to the release.
An investigation on the shooting is on-going.
